author: Xbox
description:
GRADIUS ORIGINS is available now on Xbox Series X|S

Face off against relentless Bacterian forces in GRADIUS ORIGINS, a collection that brings together six legendary arcade classics and the all-new SALAMANDER III. This collection also includes the long-awaited Gradius III AM Show version! Pilot your ship through dangerous enemy lines, upgrade your weapons, and master intense, fast-paced gameplay.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/gradius-origins/9NBZ94W14R5V/0010

author: Xbox
description:
LEGO® Party! launches September 30 on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One. Pre-order now and score 5 awesome minifigures. Let the party begin! 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/lego-party/9phh78zgbf96

LEGO® Party! is a cross-platform party game for up to four players that's built different! Compete against your friends in wacky Challenge Zones and 60 hilarious minigames from across your favorite LEGO sets like Pirates, Space, NINJAGO® and more. Join your friends online no matter their platform, for a LEGO® Party game night.

author: Xbox
description:
BALL x PIT is a brick-breaking, ball-fusing, base-building survival roguelite. Batter hordes of enemies with ricocheting balls and gather the riches of the pit to expand your homestead, generate resources and recruit unique heroes.

Coming Day 1 to Game Pass on Xbox Series XIS & Xbox PC on October 15th!

Wishlist Now:
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/ball-x-pit/9mwxf3srd7qn
